properties.areaDesc: Lake Pontchartrain and Lake Maurepas; Mississippi Sound; Lake Borgne
properties.headline: Small Craft Advisory issued February 20 at 4:10AM CST until February 20 at 6:00PM CST by NWS New Orleans LA
properties.description:
* WHAT...For the Gale Warning, north winds 25 to 30 knots with
gusts up to 40 knots and seas 6 to 9 feet expected. For the
Small Craft Advisory, north winds 20 to 25 knots with gusts of
30 to 35 knots expected.

* WHERE...Lake Pontchartrain and Lake Maurepas, Mississippi
Sound and Lake Borgne.

* WHEN...For the Gale Warning, from 6 PM this evening to 6 AM CST
Friday. For the Small Craft Advisory, from 3 PM this afternoon
to 6 PM CST this evening.

* IMPACTS...Strong winds will cause hazardous seas which could
capsize or damage vessels and reduce visibility.
properties.instruction:
Mariners should alter plans to avoid these hazardous conditions.
Remain in port, seek safe harbor, alter course, and/or secure the
vessel for severe conditions.

NWSheadline: SMALL CRAFT ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT FROM 3 PM THIS AFTERNOON TO 6 PM CST THIS EVENING... ...GALE WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 6 PM THIS EVENING TO 6 AM CST FRIDAY
